title: Lemon Garlic Chicken & Barley Bowl
description: Fresh, high-protein bowl with lemony chicken, barley, and greens.
ingredients: 1.5 lb chicken breast, cubed or sliced
instructions: Marinate chicken in lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, and oregano for at least 30 minutes.
Cook chicken in skillet until golden and cooked through.
Whisk tahini, maple syrup, soy sauce, and water for dressing.
Assemble bowls with barley, veggies, and chicken. Drizzle dressing.
notes: Great for meal prep; keeps well for next-day lunch.
